title: The Big if
creator_credit: Kratky Film, United Nations, Kamil Pixa, Peter Hollander and Brent Walker Film Productions
brief_description: An animated satire questioning what our money might be able to be used for if it was not spent on defence weapons. Animated by Boris Masnik.
